title: Microsoft Stock Reaches Record High — TradingView News
text: Microsoft stock has reached a new all-time high, with a 2.6% increase to $425.69 in morning trading. This represents a 63% rise from the same period last year. Microsoft was the top performer in both the S&P 500 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average on Thursday morning. Furthermore, Microsoft shares were up more than 2% and were on track for their 15th record close this year. Traders and investors use our platform.
